title: Was that Abraham Lincoln's last words?
subtitle: The rumors about the recent words of the former President at Ford Theater led us to consult experts at the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: The last words of Abraham Lincoln were: "We will visit the Holy Land and see those places holy at the foot of the Savior. "There's no city on Earth I'd like so much to see as Jerusalem."
